CircusUI - Class in CircusOfPlates
Graphical representation of the game manipulated by arrays data structures such as queues, stacks and arrays Works as a view and controller of that manipulates the model layer of abstraction The class is internally implemented to oscillate between the windows as the state pattern to provide one window handling to all user actions without the need to external dialogues
